name: coup-cli
description: CLI implementation of Coup card game with LLM players

scripts.play: yarn dev play --players 6 --player-model gemini:gemini-2.5-pro --player-model gemini:gemini-2.5-flash --player-model anthropic:claude-opus-4-20250514 --player-model anthropic:claude-sonnet-4-20250514 --player-model openai:gpt-5-mini-2025-08-07 --player-model openai:gpt-5-2025-08-07
